comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: all tests pass upgrading icu in both places.

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.body: I replaced the ICU4J jars in {{modules/analysis/icu/lib/}} and {{solr/contrib/extraction/lib/}} with the 4.4.2 version, then ran {{ant clean test}} from the top level, and all tests passed. (Debian Etch Linux 64-bit, Sun JDK 1.6.0_21 64-bit)

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
Committed revision 1004335 (trunk), 1004344 (3x)

thanks for testing, Steven

description:
modules/analysis uses 4.4
solr/contrib/extraction uses 4.2.1

I think we should keep them the same version, for consistency, and go to 4.4.2 since it has bugfixes.
